item.title: Golden Hour Dinners at Commons | Every Thursday
item.description: Looking for a laid-back dinner spot during the Summer? Borrow a picnic blanket from Commons, gather your friends, and join us at the Waterfall lawn every Thursday between 4:30-8PM during dinner! We will offer Vegetarian options as well as allergen free food from the Simple serving station.

item.title: Division of Human Resources Professional Development Workshop: “Leading from Anywhere”
item.description: At Rensselaer, we maintain that “leadership” involves a learnable set of actions and behaviors that is available to everyone. In this workshop, participants will explore the tenants that comprise everyday leadership and discuss the behaviors that define leadership not as positional or based on title, but rather on values and actions.
